attributes.action: Stop resurfacing our roads using loose stones that cause damage to our cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Loose stones are laid onto tar that has been sprayed onto the road surface. The stones are not compressed into the tar, they use our cars to compact the stones!!. This means our cars are sprayed with the loose stones causing multiple stone chips and eventually rust.

Also the road is never repaired before the road is resurfaced. You therefore still have pot holes. Because the stones aren't compacted the loose stones are all pushed towards the centre or edge of the road. This causes problems for motorcycles/cyclists/pushchairs and people walking down country lanes that do not have paths. 

This is a cheap, lazy and possible dangerous way to resurface our roads, we pay enough in car taxes that should enable the government to do a 'proper job'!!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
